item.title: APIs: the language agnostic love story
item.description: Extending the love story through design choices You may have noticed by now that we at RStudio have been emphatic about the R & Python love story.

item.title: Python & R in production â€” the API way
item.description: In my previous post I discussed how we can alter the R & Python story to be predicated on APIs as a way to bridge the language divide.
